Feeds.query: select SEQ_NO_N,MSISDN_V,LAST_NAME_V,SIM_NUMBER_V,FIRST_NAME_V,MOTHER_MAIDEN_V,GENDER_V,DATE_OF_BIRTH from CBS_TBL_CUST.CB_NEWREG_BIOUPDT_POOL where UPDATED_DT >= TO_DATE('{DATE}', 'yyyymmdd') and rownum<30

select a.LOCATION_CODE_V as Retail_shop_code,a.LOCATION_V as Retail_shop,b.CONTACT_NUMBER_V as Agent_msisdn,a.ADDRESS_1_V as Location_address,b.CONTACT_NUMBER_V as Location_Contact_number,b.USER_NAME_V as USER_NAME from tt_mso_1.cb_retail_outlets a left join tt_mso_1.cb_users b on a.LOCATION_CODE_V=b.LOCATION_CODE_V where rownum<3

select t.ID, t.post_date, MAX(CASE WHEN s.meta_key = '_field_your-name' THEN s.meta_value ELSE NULL END) AS Fullname, MAX(CASE WHEN s.meta_key = '_field_your-email' THEN s.meta_value ELSE NULL END) AS Email, MAX(CASE WHEN s.meta_key = '_field_your-phone' THEN s.meta_value ELSE NULL END) AS Phone, MAX(CASE WHEN s.meta_key = '_field_your-category' THEN s.meta_value ELSE NULL END) AS Category, MAX(CASE WHEN s.meta_key = '_field_your-message' THEN s.meta_value ELSE NULL END) AS Message FROM mtnonline.yelloweb_posts t inner join mtnonline.yelloweb_postmeta s on t.ID = s.post_id WHERE t.post_title = 'Foundation Contact Form' AND t.post_type = 'flamingo_inbound' AND cast(date_format(t.post_date,'%Y%m%d') as UNSIGNED)  = {DATE} GROUP BY t.ID

select order_ref_no ,service_request ,to_char(trans_date,'yyyymmddhhmmss') trans_date ,service_id ,serv_acc_link_code_n ,account_code_n ,order_status ,order_type ,order_desc ,order_mrc ,order_nrc ,currency ,user_id ,package_code ,package_name ,bill_cycl_code_n ,bandwidth ,up_link ,down_link ,link_description ,service_name ,service_status ,service_code_v ,sub_service_code_v ,subscriber_code ,installation_address ,new_bandwidth from tt_mso_1.wom_order_dtls where to_char(trans_date, 'yyyymmddhh24') = '{DATE}{strHr}' and phoneNum = {msisdn} and rownum<3
